title: 秀秀你们的电脑
author: SuperXingYu
txt_content:

replies.author: SYS_TEM
replies.txt_content:
直接打字 i5-2320
内存 24G
显卡 ATI Radeon HD 6750
硬盘1T，希捷

replies.author: 发光的木板
replies.txt_content: 刚买的台式机,八核,超平坦一层tnt 没问题

replies.txt_content:
